title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - February 2021
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided the monthly Android / Pixel update for February 2021. All supported Pixel devices running Android 11 will receive these software updates as part of the February 2021 update, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

Build numbers:
Global:
Pixel 3 (XL): RQ1A.210205.004
Pixel 3a (XL): RQ1A.210205.004
Pixel 4 (XL): RQ1A.210205.004
Pixel 4a: RQ1A.210205.004
Pixel 4a (5G): RQ1A.210205.004
Pixel 5: RQ1A.210205.004
Verizon:
Pixel 3 (XL): RQ1D.210205.004
Pixel 4a (5G): RQ1D.210205.004
Pixel 5: RQ1D.210205.004
T-Mobile:
Pixel 4a (5G): RQ1C.210205.006
Pixel 5: RQ1C.210205.006

Notable fixes:


The OTA update will roll out in phases depending on carrier and device. Users will receive a notification once it becomes available.

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin

Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
